Name: Buckwheat
SeedDescription: Plant these in spring. Takes 4 days to mature. Harvest with a scythe.

SeedDescriptionLocalization.es: Plántalas en primavera. Tardan 4 días en madurar. Cosecha con una guadaña.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ko: 봄 작물. 성장하려면 4일이 소요됩니다. 낫으로 수확합니다.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.hu: Ezeket tavasszal ültesd el. 4 napig tart megérniük. Kaszával arathatod le.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ja: 春植えの作物。そだつのに4日かかる。収穫にはカマが必要。
